A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian must hate JJ to destroy everything The Force Awakens set up and end with the story in shambles. You could try and justify the narrative choices\, but the sloppiness of it shows the incompetence. They wasted 30 minutes on a side quest just to show a bunch of people in costumes. All the TFA characters are lessened and the pointless Rose character adds very little.
